items.sentence: Tom knows that he isn't supposed to help Mary do that.
Tom doesn't know he isn't supposed to do that anymore.
Maybe Tom doesn't know he isn't likely to be punished.
You aren't suggesting Tom could've done that, are you?
Put the book on the shelf when you're through with it.
I think our French teacher is around thirty years old.
Thank you for telling us that it was Tom who did that.
Tom wished that he could've spent more time with Mary.
I have a long list of stuff that I want to throw away.
Tom and Mary blamed each other for their baby's death.
Tom and Mary seem to enjoy doing many things together.
Tom dated Mary's sister before he started dating Mary.
Tom didn't know what Mary's next move was going to be.
Tom spends more time with Mary than he does with John.
You would never try to do that by yourself, would you?
A man shouldn't be a pastor until he's in his forties.
We're banking on you to provide all the money we need.
The longer you stay, the more overtime pay you'll get.
Please come to meet me some time when it's convenient.
I'm glad you could come. Please make yourself at home.
